description: This course is about discovering fast, easy and low-cost ways to create great video. Video Marketing Shortcuts will benefit video newbies and experienced video creators alike who want to streamline and simply the process of video marketing, by discovering and using the latest online video tools and resources. This brief, 3-part course will put you on the fast-trick to video marketing by providing video tips and tricks, and by sharing low and no-cost online websites, apps and software designed to make video simple. The course includes easy-to-follow video lessons, software demos and PDF checklists and "cheat sheets" for making video simple. Take this course if you want to greatly improve your video marketing and YouTube marketing efforts.
title: Video Marketing Shortcuts
